price: Fãce hanyar Jahannama, sunã mãsu dawwama a cikinta har abada, kuma wannan yã kasance, ga Allah, mai sauƙi.
arabic: إِلَّا طَرِيقَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: illā ṭarīqa jahannama khālidīna fīhā abadan wakāna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīran
